# cmccloudv2_iam_role_assignment (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "cmccloudv2_iam_role_assignment" "role" {
    role_id 	= "d8d9b174-a62b-41f8-a812-693432379834" 
	project_id 	= "b5313a8d-7971-4136-9571-a2a7c113803b"
	group_id 	= "30d51648-7973-4800-ac27-9ac61df11a66"
}
```

### Required

- `group_id` (String) The id of the group.

- `role_id` (String) The ID of the role.
